experiences.description: Founded and leading a tech startup funded by NASSCOM Foundation and incubated at IIIT Bangalore.
responsibilities: Set up scalable and efficient technical architectures to support company projects and products
Conducted in-depth market surveys and research to stay ahead of industry trends and identify new opportunities
Managed the complete product lifecycle from concept to launch, ensuring quality and timely delivery
Led a team of 7 interns, providing mentorship and guidance to drive successful project outcomes
Handled legal compliance and regulatory requirements across various business aspects
Devised and implemented effective marketing strategies to boost product visibility and drive growth
achievements: Spearheaded the development of a robust backend using Appwrite, ensuring scalability and reliability
Designed an engaging UI/UX with a dystopian dark theme featuring a dynamic navbar and profile app bar
Integrated a voice assistant to facilitate inventory management and billing, enhancing functionality and user interaction
Coordinated with the development team and collaborated with clients to align deliverables with project goals

experiences.description: Worked as a fullstack development intern focusing on React/React Native applications and AI integration.
responsibilities: Designed and developed Single Page Application (SPA) components and mobile apps using ReactJS/React Native
Assisted in various projects by brainstorming design ideas and refining UI/UX elements
Integrated communication with back-end server APIs following predefined protocols
Ensured comprehensive documentation and adherence to functional programming paradigms
Collaborated with the team to manage, optimize, and customize multiple web applications
Gained hands-on experience in fine-tuning LLMs for specialized tasks
